capsules_submitted.utterance: So Hagrid's hobbies are pretty well-known, right? I mean, he loves his pets, and it's not surprising that he enjoys spending time with them. He's always been quite the animal lover, if you ask me.

You know, I think Hagrid's love for magical creatures is really admirable. He has a special bond with them, and it's not surprising that he enjoys spending time with his pets, especially after all the care and attention they require. I mean, who wouldn't want to spend their free time playing with Hippogriffs or caring for Thestrals? It's just wonderful to see him so happy doing something he loves.
